Instructions

You will be shown 6 generated questions as well as corresponding paraphrases. For each pair of generated question and paraphrase, please select whether the paraphrase and the question have the same meaning. The two can be phrased diferently, but were someone to ask you either question, you should arrive at the same answer.Your work will be examined by a human, after which you will receive your payment.If you have any concerns (e.g. there is a problem with the HIT), please leave them in the feedback.

Below are some examples of good and bad paraphrases.

Examples

Question: what are all the player where years in toronto is 2012

Good paraphrase Who played in Toronto during 2012?
Bad paraphrase What player
Why is this bad This is incomplete.

Question: what is the total number of position where school/club team is california and years in toronto is 2003-05

Good paraphrase What is the number of the player from California that played between 2003-05 in Toronto?
Bad paraphrase Who played between 2003 to 2005 in Toronto who is also from California?
Why is this bad The generated question asks for a total number where as this asks for a list of people.

Question: what is the minimum year where bbc two total viewing is 7,530,000

Good paraphrase What was the earliest year where the BBC Two had a total viewing of 7,530,000?
Bad paraphrase What year was the BBC two total viewing 7,530,000?
Why is this bad The generated question asks for the minimum year, whereas this just asks for the year.

Task

Pair 1

Question: what are all the obama % where county is burlington

Paraphrase: What percentage of people voted for Obama in Burlington?

Pair 2

Question: what are all the mccain % where county is burlington

Paraphrase: What percentage of voters choise McCain in Burlington?

Pair 3

Question: what are all the others % where others # is 802

Paraphrase: What percentage of voters voted for a third party in the county that had 802 third party voters?

Pair 4

Question: what are all the mccain % where others % is 1.1%

Paraphrase: What percentage of voters chose McCain in the county where 1.1% of voters voted third party?

Pair 5

Question: what are all the mccain % where others % is 2.1%

Paraphrase: What percentage of voters chose McCain in the county where 2.1% of voters voted third party?

Pair 6

Question: what are all the county where others # is 915

Paraphrase: What county had 915 third party voters?

Optional Feedback
